TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RoutedCommand extends System.Object implements class System.Windows.Input.ICommand

summary.span: 定义一个实现 并通过元素树路由的命令。

span.span: Defines a command that implements and is routed through the element tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 并上的方法不包含该命令的应用程序逻辑与典型情况一样，但这些方法而不是，引发遍历元素树，以查找的对象的事件.The and methods on a do not contain the application logic for the command as is the case with a typical , but rather, these methods raise events that traverse the element tree looking for an object with a . 事件处理程序附加到包含命令逻辑。The event handlers attached to the contain the command logic. 方法将引发和事件。The method raises the and events. 方法将引发和事件。The method raises the and events. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage \<*object* *property*="*predefinedCommandName*"/>\<*object* *property*="*predefinedCommandName*"/> \- 或 -\- or - \<*对象**属性*="*predefinedClassName*。*predefinedCommandName*"/ >\<*object* *property*="*predefinedClassName*.*predefinedCommandName*"/> \- 或 -\- or - \<*对象**属性*="{ *customClassName*。*customCommandName*}"/ >\<*object* *property*="{ *customClassName*.*customCommandName*}"/> ## XAML 值XAML Values *predefinedClassName**predefinedClassName* 预定义的命令类之一。One of the predefined command classes. *predefinedCommandName**predefinedCommandName* 预定义的命令之一。One of the predefined commands. *customClassName**customClassName* 自定义类，该类包含自定义命令。A custom class which contains the custom command. 通常需要自定义类`xlmns`前缀映射; 请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 WPF XAML 的 Namespace 映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。Custom classes generally require an `xlmns` prefix mapping; see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). *customCommandName**customCommandName* 自定义命令。A custom command.

summary.span: 确定此 在其当前状态是否可以执行。

span.span: Determines whether this can execute in its current state.

returns.span: 如果可以对当前命令目标执行此命令，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the command can execute on the current command target; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确定如果的实际逻辑才能执行当前命令目标没有包含在方法，而不是引发和事件的隧道和冒泡通过元素正在查找的对象的树。The actual logic that determines if a can execute on the current command target is not contained in the methods, rather raises the and the events which tunnel and bubble through element tree looking for a object with a . 如果为此找到，则附加到调用。If a for that is found, then the attached to is called. 这些处理程序提供编程逻辑用于确定是否可以或不执行。These handlers supply the programming logic for determining if the can execute or not. 并事件，则将引发。The and events are raised on the . 如果未设置上，则和具有键盘焦点的元素上引发事件。If the is not set on the , the and events are raised on the element with keyboard focus. ## Examples 下面的示例是事件处理程序的自定义实现从。The following example is a event handler from a custom implementation of . `this.Command` 在此示例中是属性上的。`this.Command` in this example is the property on the . 如果该命令不是`null`，该命令将强制转换为。If the command is not `null`, the command is cast to a . 如果该命令是，则方法调用传递和。If the command is a , then the method is called passing the and the . 如果命令不是，强制转换为并方法调用传递。If command is not a , it is cast to an and the method is called passing the . 如果方法将返回`true`，然后启用该控件; 否则，该控件为禁用。If the method returns `true`, then the control is enabled; otherwise, the control is disable. [!code-csharp[ImplementICommandSource#ImplementICommandCanExecuteChanged](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImplementICommandSource/CSharp/CommandSlider.cs#implementicommandcanexecutechanged)] [!code-vb[ImplementICommandSource#ImplementICommandCanExecuteChanged](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImplementICommandSource/visualbasic/commandslider.vb#implementicommandcanexecutechanged)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CanExecuteChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 当命令管理器检测到对命令源所进行的更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when changes to the command source are detected by the command manager.

summary.span: 这些更改通常影响是否应对当前命令目标执行命令。

span.span: These changes often affect whether the command should execute on the current command target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 侦听事件，引发的。The listens for the event, which is raised by the . 时满足条件时将引发事件，可能会更改是否应执行该命令，如更改在键盘焦点。The event is raised whenever conditions are met that may change the whether the command should execute, such as a change in keyboard focus. 当该命令收到事件，它会发出事件。When the command receives the event, it raises the event. 通常情况下，命令源将侦听此事件和查询通过方法。Generally, the command source will listen for this event and query the by way of the method. 如果无法执行此命令作为其命令绑定的一部分，大多数命令源将禁用自身。Most command sources will disable themselves if the command cannot be executed, as part of their command binding. 此示例是当用本身灰色出时无法执行此命令。An example of this is when a grays itself out when the command cannot be executed. 在某些情况下，不知道的条件可更改要执行的命令的功能的更改。In some situations, the is unaware of a change in conditions that alters the ability of a command to execute. 在这些情况下，您可以强制到引发通过调用事件方法，这又导致引发事件。In these cases, you can force the to raises the event by calling the method, this will in turn cause the to raise the event. ## Examples 下面的示例是事件处理程序的自定义实现从。The following example is a event handler from a custom implementation of . `this.Command` 在此示例中是属性上的。`this.Command` in this example is the property on the . 如果该命令不是`null`，该命令将强制转换为。If the command is not `null`, the command is cast to a . 如果该命令是，则方法调用传递和。If the command is a , then the method is called passing the and the . 如果命令不是，强制转换为并方法调用传递。If command is not a , it is cast to an and the method is called passing the . 如果方法将返回`true`，然后启用该控件; 否则，该控件处于禁用状态。If the method returns `true`, then the control is enabled; otherwise, the control is disabled. [!code-csharp[ImplementICommandSource#ImplementICommandCanExecuteChanged](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImplementICommandSource/CSharp/CommandSlider.cs#implementicommandcanexecutechanged)] [!code-vb[ImplementICommandSource#ImplementICommandCanExecuteChanged](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImplementICommandSource/visualbasic/commandslider.vb#implementicommandcanexecutechanged)]
